EmailTemplate.description: US-0008102 : [US]* Deals Mass Submission for External Seller Approval Process
EmailTemplate.name: NA Deals - Send to Seller
EmailTemplate.subject: Deals for Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!EBH_Deal__c.Deal_Contract_Seller_Name__c}
Please click on the below link to approve/ decline deal terms via individual order forms. In the link, enter “Approved” or “Declined” in the Individual Order Forms to submit your approval.
Amendments submitted after this approval will cancel these Deal Terms.
Click Here
Thanks
